text: TeAriki ki mee ake, “Kootou ki hakamattoni lokoi i te mee nei! Nau ma ki hakateki no hakasura mai, e mee koi ma ko te tama kailaarao e uru atu ki loto naa hare kootou i te saaita kootou see illoa. Kootou ki roorosi hakaraaoi ki see hakatekia kootou. Kootou ki ttara naa taapuru kootou ki mmau, ki see nnapa kootou i naa furoffuro takaffua kootou vaaroto te henua i taku sao ma ki hakasura atu.”16.15 Mt 24.43-44; Lk 12.39-40; Rev 3.3
